meanings.definition: A type of lizard found in warm climates.
meanings.sent1: The skinks basked in the sun to warm up their bodies.
meanings.sent2: I saw a few skinks darting across the rocks in the desert.
meanings.sent3: Why did the skinks bring tiny sunglasses to the beach?
meanings.sent4: The skinks in the garden were like miniature dinosaurs roaming around.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the skinks made them stand out in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit skinks across the field to escape the fox.
meanings.sent2: I need to skinks to catch up with my friends ahead.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squirrel skinks away with the acorn?
meanings.sent4: Time seems to skinks by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The children skinks around the playground, full of energy.
